description: She is Miss Fukoma High and the most popular girl in Junta`s school. Tomoko is also the ex-girlfriend of Ryuji. She falls in love with Junta because of his Mega-Playboy powers (in fact, these powers manifest for the first time in front of her). Apart of this, she`s a quite lonely girl; her mother died and her father works abroad.
name: Saeki Tomoko
